name: Boost MinGW 32-bit Builds
short_description:
Static and dynamic library builds of the Boost software libraries, built with the 32-bit MinGW toolchain on Microsoft Windows Vista. The builds should function correctly on other versions of Windows. The builds contained here are for use with the g++ compiler and ABI only, compiling 32-buit code and using the MinGW toolchain.

The full headers and source code is available for download at www.boost.org

CURRENTLY THE COROUTINE LIBRARY IS NOT INCLUDED. This is because it is not linking correctly. A bug has been filed.


All content included in this project is released under the "Boost License", version 1.0, which is included in each package available here and is publiushed at http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt

PLEASE SEE THE README.txt file for more information.
summary: An Attempt at Building the Boost Libraries with a MinGW 32-bit Setup
